usage.caption: font-sans text-sm text-muted-foreground
usage.code: font-mono text-xs bg-muted px-1 py-0.5 rounded text-foreground

typography.instructions: Use Manrope for all headings to give a technical, industrial feel. Use Inter for body text for maximum legibility in dense data tables. Use JetBrains Mono for Snag IDs, Reference Codes, and timestamps.

colors.instructions: Strict Dark Mode. Use Zinc (Slate-like) grays for the UI shell. The Primary color is 'Safety Orange' (#f97316) to align with construction safety gear. Use this sparingly for CTAs and active states. Avoid gradients; prefer flat, solid colors with 1px borders.

structure.sidebar: Fixed width (250px), collapsible on mobile. Darker background (#09090b).

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-sm). High contrast.

cards.style: Flat background (bg-card), 1px border (border-border), no shadow or very subtle shadow-sm.

tables.style: Dense, bordered. Header background bg-muted/50. Row hover bg-muted/50.

variants.status: Use semantic colors (red/orange/green) with 15% opacity background and 100% opacity text.

inputs.style: h-10 rounded-sm border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use consistent stroke width (1.5px or 2px).

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly on sticky headers: bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-border.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect for active cards or high-priority alerts.
visual_enhancers.textures: Avoid heavy noise. Keep it clean and vector-sharp for data readability.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for text. Use APCA standards.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-primary) are mandatory.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds.
Do not center-align main content; use left alignment for readability.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
Use Shadcn components for all interactive elements.
Dark mode is the default and preferred theme.
